Module com.example.c195pa
Package com.example.c195pa.controllers

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
com.example.c195pa.controllers.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the Login Screen Validate user login info, write login logs to txt file, Display alerts for appointments with start times for the next 15 minutes
Author:
Aimy Kohli
